data.event_time_duration: Jan 26 at 6:00 AM to Jan 26 at 10:00 AM
data.event_html:
The Pride Ride(Lets Unite, Don't Fight)


Get Yourself A Pride Ride #Tag => READY TO RIDE FOR #india #dbatg


क्या कुछ इससे भी अधिक मूर्खतापूर्ण हो सकता है कि किसी व्यक्ति को मुझे मारने का अधिकार सिर्फ इसलिए है क्योंकि वो नदी के उस पार रहता है और उसके शासक का मेरे शासक से झगड़ा हो गया है , जबकि मैंने उसके साथ कोई झगड़ा नहीं किया है ?

 


DBATG inviting you all to gather and spread the message of "UNITY" with only one "Cast & Religion:BIKER-HOOD" on our auspicious "REPUBLIC DAY 2016".Patriotism is when love of your own people comes first; nationalism, when hate for people other than your own comes first.

We should love our country and respect our flag but with the motto of "I have no country to fight for; my country is the earth, and I am a citizen of the world."
Lets unite once again with our motto of "LOVE, PEACE & RESPECT" and look forward for a brighter tomorrow.

06:00 AM : 1st Meeting point:South Ex, Mc Donalds

07:15 AM : 2nd Meeting point:Gurgaon, Ambience Mall

9:30 AM : Reach destination("Aravali Resorts" is a great venue to organise this event,rolling lawn, amazing indoor place and sufficient parking space, with complete absence of pollution, all together contribute to make even our simplest event the most mesmerising event of our life)


Buffet Breakfast will be served there after some good music.

Note: Per person cost for Buffet Breakfast is Rs 200/-

P.S.:- "Doesn't matter the size but please carry our "National Flag" either on your bike or on yourself"
"Keep Riding !!!!"
